content: The Frustrated User: This archetype represents users who experience frustration when interacting with the Cita Previa website. They may feel overwhelmed or stressed by the process, and may fear missing out on an appointment or losing valuable time. They may also feel a lack of feedback or empathy from the website, which contributes to their frustration. These users may also feel that the booking process takes too long and may be looking for a more efficient way to complete it. This archetype could include older users, users with disabilities, and users who prefer to use mobile devices. It could also include foreigners who may be unfamiliar with the website or who do not speak Spanish, as well as tech-savvy users who may have high expectations for the user experience.
